alert.note: Alert for Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 9:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Polk County through 945 PM CDT... At 921 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Hatfield, or 14 miles west of Mena, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hatfield... Cove... Camp Pioneer... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations
